name: iPhone 13 pro
description: iPhone 13 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 5G capability, and a dual-camera system with improved low-light performance.

name: iPhone 14 pro
description: iPhone 14 comes with a 6.1-inch OLED display, A15 Bionic chip, enhanced low-light camera, and crash detection feature for safety.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch display, A17 Pro chip, titanium body, and a 5x telephoto camera for enhanced zoom capabilities.

name: MacBook Air M1
description: Apple MacBook Air M1 features a 13.3-inch Retina display, M1 chip, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD with up to 18 hours of battery life.

name: MacBook Pro M2
description: Apple MacBook Pro M2 offers a 13.3-inch Retina display, M2 chip, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. Perfect for creative professionals.

name: iPad Pro
description: iPad Pro features a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M2 chip, Apple Pencil support, and up to 2TB of storage.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Apple Watch Series 9 features a 45mm Retina display, S9 SiP chip, improved health tracking, and double-tap gesture control.

name: AirPods Pro
description: AirPods Pro (2nd gen) offer active noise cancellation, adaptive transparency, improved battery life, and MagSafe charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra features a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, 200MP camera, and S Pen support.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: Galaxy Tab S9 offers an 11-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chip, and IP68 water resistance.

name: Google Pixel 8
description: Google Pixel 8 features a 6.2-inch OLED display, Tensor G3 chip, improved camera performance, and AI-powered photo editing.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: PlayStation 5 offers ultra-fast loading, ray tracing, 4K gaming, and a new DualSense controller with haptic feedback.
